column3: Weak NACK. Maybe add a comment to init.cpp to update them. Or better yet, write a script to automate updating them..\n

> add a comment to init.cpp

You'd also have to add the comment to rpc*.cpp but I guess this won't work if authors forget to read/update those files in the first place.

> write a script to automate updating

This should work but what is the point in duplicating all this information?
manpages are the go-to source for information on *nix.\n

> Better empty than wrong!

ACK. Agreed. If someone wants to make a script to automatically update the manpages from --help I certainly encourage that, but up to then, this is very true.
